material.mattext: How likely is the dangerous event that no warning light shows up when the engine is overheating? In other words, given that the engine is overheating, how likely is it that we will not get a warning?
Here we need to find P(not W|H). Recall that the complement rule "works" with conditional probabilities as long as we condition on the same event. And therefore P(not W|H)=1-P(W|H)=1-.98=.02.
